backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister implementing storage, access control, products, users, carts, orders, and credentials with role-based logic and admin bootstrap.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module that returns the provided state unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for auth-related feature changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend components, pages, and styling updates across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: App HTML entry point mounting the root React element and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router configuration defining all app routes including account, admin, support, and commerce pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGuard: Simple passthrough wrapper that performs no admin authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Sign-in/sign-out button using backend session state and navigating to signup when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth gate that allows access for signed‑in or guest users and otherwise shows a sign‑in/guest prompt.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Auto-rotating banner carousel with looping slides and gold gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeSearchB: Search bar with debounced queries that fetches matching products and categories and navigates on selection.
Main app layout with header, footer, guest notice, profile setup modal, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation bar with logo, search, cart, account actions, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Mobile bottom navigation bar linking to catalog, cart, and account with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Product display card with image, rating, price, and actions to add to cart or wishlist.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductS: Horizontally scrollable section rendering a titled list of product cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting new users to enter basic profile details and save them.
Documentation describing the admin activation flow, backend behavior, errors, and UI mappings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActivation.ts: Provides a mutation to validate a 4‑digit activation code and call bootstrapAdmin, then refresh admin-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Derives signed‑in state from backend user role unless guest mode is enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useBootstrapAdmin.ts: Thin alias that re-exports useAdminActivation for consistent admin activation flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerPrincipal.ts: Fetches the caller's principal from the backend once an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerUserProfileS: Safely fetches the caller's user profile only when signed in and an actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Retrieves the caller's backend role and exposes convenience flags for guest, user, and admin states.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity state, login, and logout via React context, loading and managing AuthClient identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains data and mutation hooks for categories, products, ratings, cart, and other backend features using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by mounting React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountLoginP: Provides login entry with options to sign up or continue as guest, redirecting if already signed in.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountPage.t: Account hub where users sign in, sign out, enter guest mode, and access profile, orders, or wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/account/AccountSignup: Handles creating username/password credentials with validation, hashing, and redirect on success.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminActivatePa: Shows admin activation notice and auto‑redirects users to the admin dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Displays admin sales analytics including totals, averages, recent orders, and top products using order and product query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Shows a customer info page with an alert explaining on-chain customer data handling, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with navigation cards linking to product, order, customer, analytics, and support sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Provides order management with filtering, status updates, and a table of orders fetched from backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Allows admins to view products and create new products or categories via dialogs, including image upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportTic: Displays a placeholder alert describing the demo support ticket system, protected by AdminGuard.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page, loading cart data, mapping products, and providing item removal and checkout actions.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays product catalog with category, price, and sort filters, supporting search and mobile/desktop filter UIs.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout steps including address, payment, cart review, and order placement with profile saving.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders homepage with hero, categories, product sections, search bar, and featured/trending/recommended items.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows a protected notifications page with placeholder text when no notifications exist.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed order info with item breakdown, tracking status, and invoice download.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user orders sorted by date with navigation to individual order details and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays product details, image, cart/wishlist actions, and rating submission with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and updates the signed‑in user's profile with editable personal info.
frontend/src/pages/support/FaqPage.tsx: Shows a FAQ list with expandable answers and a link to contact support.
frontend/src/pages/support/SupportTicket: Displays details for a single support ticket using a ticketId param, protected by authentication.
Enables users to create and view local support tickets with a dialog form, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Loads the user's wishlist and displays matching products or an empty state with navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/extractBackendErrorMe: Extracts message strings from various backend error shapes, including nested objects and stringified patterns.
frontend/src/utils/guestSession.ts: Manages guest-mode state using sessionStorage with helpers to check, enable, and clear it.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, store them in sessionStorage, persist them, and manipulate hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and requirements focusing on removing Internet Identity usage and enabling pure username/password authentication.
